name: Apartment Escape (iMakeStuffSC)
description:
A friendly, somewhat eerie, interactive free-roam escape room puzzle game! Just click on anything you see. Press B to open and close inventory, press P to open and close the sticky note.

This game is part of the escape room series (Kitchen Escape, Bathroom Escape, Apartment Escape). It involves interacting with objects around the free-to-explore area to escape a small room.
